attributes.action: Allow schools and UK business's to have a half day on Monday 21st November 2022.
attributes.additional_details:
England kick off their World Cup campaign against Iran and is a 1pm UK kick off.

As football has bought the nation together this is a great occasion for history to repeat itself and to support our well being in the workplace.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

It is up to schools and businesses whether to have a half day on Monday 21 November, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to make Monday 21 November a bank holiday, if that's something you'd like to happen.
